categories: Category:Imperial-class Star Destroyers of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: The Solicitude was a 1,600-meter-long Imperial-class Star Destroyer in service to the Imperial Navy during the Imperial Era. Moden Canady began his military career in the Imperial Navy as the commander of the Star Destroyer.

Years later, Canady went on to serve the First Order, successor to the Empire, as the captain of the Mandator IV-class Siege Dreadnought Fulminatrix. On the Siege Dreadnought, Canady was resentful of his crew, who were young, incompetent, and lacked the training and experience of his former Imperial shipmates.
The Solicitude was first mentioned in 2017 with the release of Star Wars: The Last Jedi: The Visual Dictionary, a reference book written by Pablo Hidalgo.
